pages.text: Knockback is an ability that gives the gem that has it more knockback to their attacks, throwing their enemy away from them.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Topaz$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Agate$(li)Jasper$(li)Nephrite$(li)Obsidian$(li)Ruby
